titles.title: A bill to provide for the use of certain immigration procedures with respect to Cuban nationals.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 6/9/1987--Introduced. Provides for the processing of current and former Cuban political prisoners as refugees for U.S. entry regardless of the length of imprisonment. Provides for the issuance of immigrant visas to Cuban nationals without regard to: (1) a provision of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to the refusal to accept the return of nationals; (2) the visa application site; or (3) the date of departure from Cuba for persons applying for visas outside Cuba.
